attributes.action: Change the price of insurance for people just passing their tests
attributes.additional_details: They expect 17 year olds to be able to fork out £250-£300 pound a month it’s a joke
attributes.background: Lower the prices as it is massively overpriced

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Ban higher car insurance premiums for young and new drivers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709463
